behaviors.behavior: Using Fly Fishing Montana consistently and using its features to plan and enhance their trips
behaviors.frequency: Regularly, has been using the platform for seven years
supporting_quotes: I have been using Fly Fishing Montana for seven years, since the first day it launched. At first, I would use it just to check river reports and make me book guides on fly fishing trip.

Uh, I start by tying a lot of flies when I'm anticipating. I usually go visit the rivers reports where I'm going to be fishing, and then I like to kind of see pictures of what other people are catching, and then look at forecast weather and when hatches will be happening when I'm there.

goals.goal: To use Fly Fishing Montana for relaxation and enjoyment
goals.motivation: The user seeks escapism and enjoys the interactive and explorative aspects of fly fishing
supporting_quotes: Most of the time it's escapism because our hedonistic-
I've been there a couple of times and I fished for many, many years, but um... And I spent one summer there, so I'd say I'm decent.

needs.need: A guide recommender tool for more personalized and responsive features
supporting_quotes: Well, configuring a trip, it's always nice to be able to see what, what boat is available. And also when a guide's not available that I like, maybe there's a way to have a guide recommender tool that shows me a guide that's similar, in the same area, but not th- the one that's a- available or...

pain_points.impact: It affects the user's convenience and decision-making in planning their trips
pain_points.pain_point: Difficulty in booking guides, especially when preferred guide is unavailable
supporting_quotes: Well, configuring a trip, it's always nice to be able to see what, what boat is available. And also when a guide's not available that I like, maybe there's a way to have a guide recommender tool that shows me a guide that's similar, in the same area, but not th- the one that's a- available or...

pain_points.impact: It requires the user to adapt quickly to find where the fish have moved
supporting_quotes: You gotta figure out where the fish went because they're not gonna be where you expected them to be. So when the river's up or the river's cloudy, you gotta go figure out where the fish are hiding.

preferences.preference: Appreciates live tracking feature and the ability to see which boats are available
preferences.reason: It enhances user's engagement and helps in planning their trips
supporting_quotes: But later, they added the feature where you could actually go see who's fishing where live and it allows me to keep track of the people that are on the river and see their exciting catches when they post pictures or even photographs of the hatch, and it really allows me a much more, uh, interactive-
Well, configuring a trip, it's always nice to be able to see what, what boat is available.
